thread.title: Sioux Falls Floral Shop Fills Special Order For Elton John
thread.title_full: Sioux Falls Floral Shop Fills Special Order For Elton John

title: Sioux Falls Floral Shop Fills Special Order For Elton John
text:
Sioux Falls Floral Shop Fills Special Order For Elton John October 1, 2015, 4:48 PM Courtesy: Josephine's Floral Designery SIOUX FALLS, SD - 
Sir Elton John will be surrounded by beautiful flowers during his stop in Sioux Falls. 
Josephine's Floral Designery was presented a challenge when the staff was asked to fill a specific order for the musician. 
Here's a look at the request: White and red roses in "pave" style with clear rocks in the base of the cubed 100 mm square glass vase Large glass vase with lilies, mums and carnations and daisies 
They couldn't use any fillers or greens in the bouquets. Owner Josephine Schallenkamp says preparing the vases of roses is harder than it looks because the stems all have to go straight down. 
In addition, staff sent a posy for the singer. 
Schallenkamp says she was flattered to be chosen because she’s a huge fan of Elton John. 
“I wanted it to be just perfect,” she said. “Hopefully he thinks it was.” 
Elton John and His Band: The Final Curtain tour stops in Sioux Falls on Friday. Doors at the Denny Sanford PREMIER Center open at 6:30 p.m. with the show starting at 8 p.m. Photo Credit:
